about_the_game: Hailing from The Dominican Republic, this absolute beast of a car is none other than Jhonnattan Castro’s Toyota Rocket Bunny GR86! Much to unpack here for this exciting new release, it’s wide, it’s aggressive, it’s unmistakably Rocket Bunny. Castro fans will be ecstatic to hear that it will be running a new powerplant (YEP! A B58 ENGINE!) and will be reflected in-game as an engine with high response. Name a better car to relive the Formula Drift hype, go on!
detailed_description: Hailing from The Dominican Republic, this absolute beast of a car is none other than Jhonnattan Castro’s Toyota Rocket Bunny GR86! Much to unpack here for this exciting new release, it’s wide, it’s aggressive, it’s unmistakably Rocket Bunny. Castro fans will be ecstatic to hear that it will be running a new powerplant (YEP! A B58 ENGINE!) and will be reflected in-game as an engine with high response. Name a better car to relive the Formula Drift hype, go on!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400F or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB (GeForce GTX 970 / amd RX 5500 XT)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Jhonnattan Castro’s Rocket Bunny Toyota GR86!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Portuguese - Portugal
